.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Memory`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class Memory

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 表示连续内存区域。

span.span: Represents a contiguous region of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与类似 ， `Memory` 表示内存的连续区域。Like , `Memory` represents a contiguous region of memory. 但与不同的 `Memory` 是，不是 [ref 结构](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/struct#ref-struct)。Unlike , however, `Memory` is not a [ref struct](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/struct#ref-struct). 这意味着， `Memory` 可以将放置在托管堆上，而 不能。This means that `Memory` can be placed on the managed heap, whereas cannot. 因此，该结构没有 `Memory` 与实例相同的限制 。As a result, the `Memory` structure does not have the same restrictions as a instance. 具体而言：In particular: - 它可用作类中的字段。It can be used as a field in a class. - 它可以跨 `await` 和边界使用 `yield` 。It can be used across `await` and `yield` boundaries. 除了之外 `Memory` ，还可以使用 来表示不可变或只读内存。In addition to `Memory`, you can use to represent immutable or read-only memory.

remarks.format: 如果为，则两个对象相等：The two objects are equal if: - `other` 为 或 对象。`other` is a or object. - 这两个对象都指向同一数组，并且具有相同的长度。Both objects point to the same array and have the same length. `Equals(Memory)`方法执行引用相等性的测试; 不比较的元素是否 相等。The `Equals(Memory)` method performs a test for reference equality; it does not compare the elements of for equality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 另请参阅See also 在释放返回的对象之前，垃圾回收器不会移动内存 。The garbage collector will not move the memory until the returned object is disposed. 这使您可以检索和使用内存的地址。This enables you to retrieve and use the memory's address.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 将此内存的内容复制到新数组中。

span.span: Copies the contents from the memory into a new array.

returns.span: 包含当前内存中元素的数组。

span.span: An array containing the elements in the current memory.

remarks.format: 因为对方法的调用 `ToArray` 会执行堆分配，所以通常应避免这样做。Because a call to the `ToArray` method performs a heap allocation, it should generally be avoided. 但是，有时需要利用仅可用于数组的功能。However, it is sometimes necessary to take advantage of functionality that is only available for arrays. 对方法的每个调用都将 `ToArray` 返回一个新数组。Each call to the `ToArray` method returns a new array.
